This hydrating hair mask works to prevent harmful metal particles from re-entering the hair fiber, while enhancing softness and adding shine. Its exclusive formula can be used on color-treated hair to help protect against metal-induced color fading, or on virgin hair to reduce breakage and restore hair health. Safe to use daily or weekly as needed based on hair concerns...Fragrance Description: An addictive fragrance with top notes of citrus and base notes of musky woods...Clinical Results: In an instrumental test vs. non-conditioning shampoo:.- 87% less breakage
